body: So bitset is nice but we shouldn’t assume that all our accesses will be in range. All functions that use this need to have asserts to make sure that it’s safe
body_html: So bitset is nice but we shouldn’t assume that all our accesses will be in range. All functions that use this need to have asserts to make sure that it’s safe
body_text: So bitset is nice but we shouldn’t assume that all our accesses will be in range. All functions that use this need to have asserts to make sure that it’s safe
